Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Biological Response Modifier/Vaccine/Recombinant Viral Vaccine/ALVAC Vaccine/ALVAC(2) Melanoma Multi-antigen Vaccine
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A therapeutic cancer vaccine, based on a replication-defective recombinant canarypox virus (ALVAC) encoding multiple melanoma antigens, with potential immunostimulatory and antineoplastic activities. Vaccination with ALVAC(2) melanoma multi-antigen therapeutic vaccine may stimulate the host immune system to mount an immune response against antigen-expressing melanoma cells, resulting in inhibition of tumor growth and/or metastasis.
